Government
==========

9

1

1

2

1. #### [Agendas & Minutes](https://www.shenandoahtx.us/AgendaCenter)

   Access easily searchable meeting agendas and minutes for various boards, commissions, and committees.
2. #### [Boards & Commissions](https://www.shenandoahtx.us/228/Boards-Commissions)

   Access the boards and commissions that drive your local government. Find agendas, member information, and other meeting details.
3. #### [City Council](https://www.shenandoahtx.us/220/City-Council)

   Shenandoah is a General Law city with a population of approximately 4,000 people. The city is governed by an elected city council with six members - five council members and a mayor.
4. #### [Departments](https://www.shenandoahtx.us/149/Departments)

   Get information regarding the departments dedicated to keeping the community moving.
5. #### [Legal Notices](https://www.shenandoahtx.us/298/Legal-Notices)

   Published legal notices
6. #### [Bid Postings](https://www.shenandoahtx.us/140/Bid-Opportunities)
7. #### [Capital Projects](https://www.shenandoahtx.us/358/Capital-Projects)
8. #### [Tamina Utility Project](https://www.shenandoahtx.us/363/Tamina-Utility-Project)
